name: Nebullam (DBA Clayton Farms)
headline: Indoor farms that grow directly for consumers.
description:
Mission: Provide people with the food they deserve.

We accomplish this mission by building farm+restaurants to serve the world's freshest salads, wraps, and smoothies.

founders.name: Clayton Mooney, Founder
founders.description:
Chief Farmer at Clayton Farms Salads (YC W19).
+ Ultrarunning. Boxing. Art.

founders.name: Mahmoud Parto, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at IoTFlows Inc

raw_markdown="Loyalty Club members earn up to 5% cashback 
Order Now 
FARM FRESH SALADS, WRAPS, SMOOTHIES 
At Clayton Farms Salads, we're revolutionizing fast food with our farm-to-window concept. With our onsite farm and daily harvests, you get the flavor and freshness you deserve. 
Order Now 
About us 
Gift cards 
Loyalty Club 
Catering 
Reach Out 
™ 
We’re grateful to farm for you. We’re always expanding and innovating our farming techniques to add even more fresh and nutritious greens to our menu, thanks to your feedback. We’re also dedicated to reducing our carbon footprint and promoting sustainability in every aspect of our farm and restaurant. 
Committed to Continuous Growth 
Always Growing 
250,000 gallons of water saved to date 
Dive into Our Delicious Menu 
Farm fresh ingredients make all the difference. Indulge in our mouth-watering salads, wraps, and smoothies, crafted with the freshest greens and the finest ingredients, grown just 15 feet away from our kitchen. Each bite and sip will transport you to a world of flavor. 
Salads 
Crunchy, vibrant, and full of life. Choose from a variety of greens, toppings, and dressings. 
Wraps 
Perfectly balanced and wrapped with love. Choose your favorite fillings for a satisfying meal on the go. 
Smoothies 
Refreshing and revitalizing. Blended with fresh fruits and greens for a nutrient-packed treat. 
90,000 salads, wraps, and smoothies served to date 
Order now 
Sustainable Farming 
We use eco-friendly practices and packaging, to ensure our greens are as good for the environment as they are for you. 
Handpicked Daily 
Every morning, we harvest the freshest greens to ensure maximum flavor and nutrition. 
Transparency 
Watch the magic happen. Visit our farm and see where your food comes from. 
Do you know your farmer? 
What sets us apart? We are actual farmers, growing the mouthwatering food that goes into our menu, just 15 feet away from our kitchen. We farm 7 days a week. 52 weeks a year. Our commitment to freshness starts with our seeds and ends with a delicious meal in your hands. 
Drive-Thru & Online Ordering 
We've reimagined fast food with our unique drive-thru and online ordering system. Order online for pickup or delivery and enjoy the world's freshest meals from the comfort of your car or home. 
Drive-Thru: 2435 Grand Ave in Ames 
Online: 
Order now 
Same-Day Harvest 
Experience the ultimate in freshness, as we farm for you every day. 
Full Flavor & Nutrition 
Freshly picked greens retain more flavor and nutrition, offering you the best in every bite. 
Farm to Window 
This is the healthy fast food revolution you’ve been waiting for. 
The World’s Freshest—Farm to Window 
Our same-day harvest guarantees full flavor and full nutrition. Enjoy the freshest ingredients, harvested in the morning and served to you by noon. This is farm-to-window dining at its best. 
Order now 
Ready to Enjoy Food with Full Flavor? 
Join the revolution today! Whether you’re craving a crisp salad, a flavorful wrap, or a refreshing smoothie, we’ve got you covered. Enjoy the convenience of our drive-thru or order online for quick pickup or delivery. 
Follow us: 
© 2025. Nebullam, Inc. d/b/a Clayton Farms Salads. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Nebullam (DBA Clayton Farms)**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator Batch W19, Nebullam operates under the trade name Clayton Farms, based in Ames, Iowa. The company is on a mission to provide people with the food they deserve by bringing fresh, sustainably grown produce directly to consumers through an innovative farm-to-window concept. 

### Mission and Vision
At the heart of Clayton Farms is a commitment to supplying the freshest salads, wraps, and smoothies directly from their indoor farms. The initial vision was straightforward: ensure everyone has access to quality food. Today, this translates into unique dining experiences that prioritize flavor, nutrition, and sustainable practices.

### Business Model
Clayton Farms stands out by merging the dining and farming experience. With an onsite farm just 15 feet from their kitchen, they utilize daily harvests to serve meals only hours fresh. Customers can enjoy a quick meal via their drive-thru or opt for online ordering to either pick up or have their food delivered. 

### Sustainability Efforts
The company takes sustainability seriously. They’ve saved 250,000 gallons of water to date and apply eco-friendly farming practices, ensuring that their impact on the environment is minimal. They not only grow food, they actively promote transparency, inviting consumers to see where their meals come from.

### Unique Offerings
Their menu is crafted around the freshest ingredients, with a focus on:
- **Salads**: A vibrant mix of greens and toppings.
- **Wraps**: Packed with perfectly balanced fillings.
- **Smoothies**: Refreshing blends of fruits and greens.

To date, they’ve served 90,000 salads, wraps, and smoothies, signifying their popularity.

### Customer Engagement
To foster loyalty, Clayton Farms offers a Loyalty Club where members can earn cashback on their purchases. They also provide gift cards and catering services, catering to various customer needs.

### Team and Leadership
The Clayton Farms team consists of five dedicated employees, led by their Group Partner, Nan. Together, they are committed to continuous improvement and innovation in their farming techniques to expand their menu offerings based on customer feedback.

### Conclusion
With a strong dedication to fresh, flavorful, and sustainable dining, Nebullam (Clayton Farms) is redefining fast food in a way that makes you think differently about where your food comes from. Their operation is rooted in the belief that you deserve actual farmers growing your meals close to where you enjoy them. If you're looking to taste the future of food, Clayton Farms is worth a visit—freshness is just a bite away.

For more information, check out their website: [ClaytonFarms.com](http://ClaytonFarms.com).
